name: InfluenzaVaccinationDeclined
title: Influenza Vaccination Declined
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a patient declining an influenza vaccination.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Communication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a patient declining an influenza vaccination.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
